official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Congress should appropriate funds for the construction of high BTU coal gasification demonstration plants in Noble County, Ohio, and Perry County, Illinois.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that funding continue for the coal gasification demonstration plants in Noble County, Ohio, and Perry County, Illinois.
